body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Johnny Evans and the customer's name is Joyce Sanders.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am with Bright Solutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah! I have a question about my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I would be happy to help you with your account. May I start by getting your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jason! Could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! And one more thing, could you please tell me your phone number including the area code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's three zero two, five five five, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Jason. I see your account details now. How may I assist you further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I want to update my billing address.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can help with that. Thank you for your time today, Jason! If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
